title: Doyald Young's Books
content:
I don't know if it's been posted before, but it deserves it's own thread. If you love type (specifically logotypes), it doesn't get any better than this. I can't recommend these two books highly enough. Worth _every_ penny.   
   
 [http://www.delphipress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221233/http:/www.delphipress.com/)   
   
 -t
author: timfm
